name: Sticks and Stones (Spielsieb)
description:
Lighten up the goal to get to the next level.

Control Sticks with WASD and rotate with Mouse. Find working Firestacks by moving close to them. Switch Stick with Space or Jump (Doesn't always work perfectly).

My contribution to Trijam #79 - created in 3 hours. As it turns out 3 hours is not a lot of time to create a working game. ;-) Hope you enjoy the experience. 

Background Image:

https://pixabay.com/de/illustrations/m%C3%A4rchen-nacht-musik-fisch-himmel-11809...

Music:

https://www.humblebundle.com/ Mystical Music Bundle:  MuzStation Game Music; Story at Night
